channel.title: Mo Abudu on 无关紧要的宇宙
channel.description: Recent content in Mo Abudu on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: Idris Elba Expands Vision for African Cinema With ‘Dust to Dreams’ Drama
item.description: The actor-turned-director has brought his Lagos-set short film produced by Mo Abudu and with a star turn by Seal to the Toronto Film Festival for a world premiere.
